location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Circular from John MacLeod, Resident in the Persian Gulf, to the Commanders of all Merchant Vessels Under British Colours Trading to the Port of Bushere [Bushire]

mods.abstract: This circular informs commanders of all merchant vessels under British colours trading to the port of Bushere that commanders and officers of ships have been neglecting or delaying to send to shore all letters, newspapers or packets arriving for Bushere. MacLeod requests they should be careful to deliver all such papers to the pilot and to make sure that none have been left behind in the ships.
